message.body: I am in bluffton
How r u this morning? i drove around a while when i got home.... Driving around again...
I'm good. Glad you're back. No trace of the little guy?
I guess... No sign.. The snow is almost gone too so no tracks to follow. it was raining when i got to bluffton ... So i drove around thinking he may be on the move.... I will keep driving..
:( somebody has to have him.

Yes i searched the web to see if someone posted puppy or dog for sale. found some but not him... A fried of mine Dr. LEE had his home broken into and found his computer and wifes jewelry posted on some site associated with facebook for sale.
OMG. i just went down sunset drive off of dustman east of arbys. sad.... trailer park... A few are nothing more thaan a shack....
Do you know of a section of facebook for people to post stuff to sell?
The wells co virtual garage sale... Nana would be notified right away though. She's like queen of it or something.
Lol thank you for the laugh

Hey keep mr vanderkolk in your prayers. he fell and completely messed up his knee. the tendons and ligaments holding the kneecap were torn off and the cap twisted to the side..... He was in church with a walker.... Many months to revover hoping to walk normal....
Oh no!!! :(
Artichoke pizza!
Yum
it is even better heated up..
I know it
I should have ordered a second pie to go!
Do they deliver?
Not to Indiana
I could meet them half way
